## Define `doubler_*()` Function

<table style="font-size:14px" class="table table-bordered">
<tr>
<td valign="top">
      
```{r}
r_doubler <- function(x) {
  x * 2
}
```
      
</td>
<td valign="top">
    
```{python}
def py_doubler(x):
  return x * 2
```
    
</td>
</td>
<td valign="top">

```{Rcpp}
#include <Rcpp.h>

// [[Rcpp::export]]
int cpp_doubler(int x) {
  return x * 2;
}
```
  
</td>
</tr>
</table>


## Run `doubler_*()` Function

<table style="font-size:14px" class="table table-bordered">
<tr>
<td valign="top">
      
```{r}
r_doubler(x = 4)
```
      
</td>
<td valign="top">
    
```{python}
print(py_doubler(x = 4))
```
    
</td>
</td>
<td valign="top">

```{r}
cpp_doubler(x = 4)
```
  
</td>
</tr>
</table>
